definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="block_holderset_list" x="702" y="41"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="block0"></field><field name="block1"></field></block><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="47" y="108"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_replace_sphere" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="114" w="249">This block represents a blob feature that replaces netherrack with blackstone, like the ones that generate in the Nether.This feature should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="targetState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.GRASS</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being replaced (in this case netherrack)</comment></block></value><value name="newState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:DrySoil</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed by the feature (in this case blackstone)</comment></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">2</field><field name="max">5</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the size of the blob</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Each chunk has 0 to 5 patches of fire</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">2</field><field name="max">4</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="165">We then move the patches at the highest motion blocking block, so that they generate on the surface</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_random_patch_simple" inline="false" x="1042" y="323"><field name="tries">96</field><field name="xzSpread">7</field><field name="ySpread">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="119" w="266">This block represents a block patch feature. The blocks will only generate in valid positions (for example, grass will never generate on a stone block).Patches of fire should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Fire can only generate on netherrack blocks</comment></block></value></block><block type="mcitem_allblocks" x="499" y="356"><field name="value">Blocks.PUMPKIN</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being placed.</comment></block><block type="block_predicate_all_of" x="458" y="417"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Pumpkins need to verify two conditions to be placed.</comment><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Pumpkins can't replace other blocks</comment></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_all_of" x="627" y="461"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Fire needs to verify two conditions to be placed.</comment><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Fire can't replace other blocks</comment></block></value></block><block type="block_holderset_list" x="1144" y="446"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.GRASS</field></block><block type="placement_count" x="277" y="525"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate up to 25 blackstone blobs in each chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each blob horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the blobs don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
